title: Workflow.Build.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Workflow.Build capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the org or system profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

registration_identifier_ref.description: Reference to the agent or subscriber initiating the workflow build.
